column6:
With Mutant Town under siege and the X-Cell having taken refuge there, X-Factor races both the clock and their own divided allegiances as they try to stave off the very real possibility of every former mutant being rounded up and imprisoned as a potential terrorist. But will they have to reveal their knowledge of M-Day's secret...and, if so, what will the fallout be?,2007,4
32 PGS./Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Peter David | inker:Sandu Florea | letterer:Cory Petit | penciller:Khoi Pham | penciller (cover):Pablo Raimondi | colorist:Brian Reber
